column1: Uchi////3. Machi Cure: Everything works so well together. You get some butteriness from the yellowtail
column2: sweetness from the golden raisins and garlic brittle
column3: savoriness from the yuca chip and marcona almond
column4: a touch of acid from the pear
column5: and it's all elevated with the cold smoke that adds a great depth of flavor.
